name: COLL_AGENCY_HX
description: This table contains collection agency history information.

columns.name: TX_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the transaction record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: COLL_HX_AGENCY_ID
columns.description: The ID of the collection agency which is associated with this history information.

columns.name: COLL_HX_AGENCY_ID_COLL_AGENCY_NAME
columns.description: The name of the collection agency.

columns.name: COLL_HX_SUBMIT_DATE
columns.description: The date when account is submitted to the collection agency.

columns.name: COLL_HX_RESOLV_DATE
columns.description: The date when the agency resolved the submission.

columns.name: COLL_HX_RES_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The collection history resolution type category number for this history information.

columns.name: COLL_HX_SUBMIT_DTTM
columns.description: The UTC instant this transaction was submitted to collections.

columns.name: COLL_HX_RESOLV_DTTM
columns.description: The UTC instant this transaction was resolved with collections.
